001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007public record BasePersistentSubscriberConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
008    // if true in configuration, skip until System.currentTimeMillis()
009    public boolean getSkipOld() {
010        return configuration.getBoolean("skipOld").orElse(false);
011    }
012
013    // if set to long timestamp, skip until this timestamp is seen in event metadata
014    public Optional<Long> getSkipUntil() {
015        return configuration.getLong("skipUntil");
016    }
017}
